attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout the UK local councils are currently causing haenus damage to the graves of our loved ones. All done in the name of health and safety , the practice is causing untold stress to the victims of the council thugs. We the undersigned call upon this government to outlaw this vile practice immediately.

See: http://news.independent.co.uk/uk/this_britain/article1996335.ece
